content: this free 11 page pattern includes the basic naked doll pattern for my medium sized weebee doll and a simple hair cap when i make my medium sized weebee doll using worsted/4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook they stand at around 7 inches tall however other yarn weights and hooks can of course be used to create smaller or larger dolls **2021 update ** now there is a dedicated wardrobe of clothing items for the medium doll which you can find here 1 alternatively with a different combination of hook and/or yarn the standard size weebee doll clothing can be made to fit the medium sized weebee doll please see pages 2 - 4 of this free 11 page pattern for why this is and for more information hints tips and advice all of my dolls and clothing patterns can be found here 2 in my ravelry store due to the unexpected but wonderful popularity of my weebee dolls and clothing patterns there is now a dedicated facebook group which you can find here 3 weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but i have very little time to spare i have a three year old lol so if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible i hope you have as much fun crocheting this doll as i and many others have with the other weebee dolls 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/medium-weebee-doll-wardrobe-essentials 2 http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg 3 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/
